name: Forest Regalia
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When played: When the character to which this is attached next uses a Normal Attack during this Round: Create 2 Elemental Dice of this character's Elemental Type.
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

storytext:
"...Then the current changed and the moon's reflection was scattered. Much has changed, and yet, much will now remain unchanged forevermore.
But even if you, like me, have never met a king, you would still get the impression that Tiger was a noble and powerful king of the forest."
